alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 8:13PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN FLORENCE...DILLON...CENTRAL DARLINGTON...NORTHWESTERN MARION AND SOUTHEASTERN MARLBORO COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EST... At 813 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers over Timmonsville, or 10 miles west of Florence, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Dillon, Darlington, Timmonsville, Latta, Lamar, Quinby, Sellers, Blue Brick, Mont Clare, Mars Bluff, Brownsville, Darlington Raceway, Cartersville, Florence Darlington Technical College Main Campus, Sardis, Effingham, Oak Grove, Francis Marion University, and Bingham. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 129 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 146 and 194. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
